title: Novotel Marseille Centre Prado Vélodrome
description:
Novotel Marseille Center Prado is located in one of Marseilles’ business districts. It is 164 feet from the Périer Metro Station providing access to all areas of the city, and 0.9 mi from the Orange Velodrome Stadium.

Air-conditioned guest rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a mini-fridge. There are also facilities for making tea and coffee, and the bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries. Free Wi-Fi access is provided.

The restaurant Novotel Café offers a menu of seasonal produce and daily specials featuring original and modern cuisine with a selection of salads, sandwiches, meals and desserts. Guests can have a professional meeting, or enjoy a glass of wine in the open space.

Center de Congrès is 0.6 mi away and the hotel is 1.2 mi from the Old Port and La Canebière Boulevard; all of which are accessible by transit.

Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is a 10-minute drive away and Marseille Airport is a 30-minute drive away. Marseille Chanot Exposition Center is 0.7 mi away. Paid public parking is available nearby with charging stations for electric cars available.

availability.room_type: Executive Room with a Double Bed
Family Suite with Double Bed and Sofa Bed

top_reviews.review: It was an excellent stay at this Novotel. The location was great to explore the city. The morning market in front of the hotel was a very nice add-on to start the day. The staff was exceptional helpful - supported with getting the car securely parked and were available for all questions.  And last but not least the staff at the restaurant during breakfast were very welcoming with their happiness and good mood - making the start into the day very easy :-) We had nothing we did not like :-)
It's a very nice hotel and I always stay there when going to Marseille The toilet is a little high for me so it's not very comfortable .
The hotel staff were very helpful , the hotel was very clean and modern , it can't complain about anything Na

The outdoor balcony such a nice surprise, the separated Toilet and bath room is also a convinient touch. The location is also just a step away from a metro station. No significant issue to complaint about.
Location, clean, very friendly staff, ideal for us on a short visit in my hometown

Location close to the metro station 
Excellent communication regarding our stay
The possibility to leave the luggage upon arrival 
The staff was nice and friendly 
We had a super terrace with the view of the Notre Dame De la garde The breakfast was tasty, but chaotic, at some points they didn't have plates, forks, bread...it would be grest to have more vegetables.

Charlene and Thierry were amazing! Took great care of us, especially of my little one and constantly went above and beyond for us. Really made my little one feel special and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the  Novotel Prado. Great size rooms, great breakfast and lovely atmosphere.

Very friendly staff, perfect and very central, close to subway and buses, walking distance from the center. As we are returning to Marseille for short visits regularly this hotel has become our to-go place.

Friendly staff, good location and excellent breakfast. The major attractions like the old port and Notre-Dame de la Garde can easily be reached by public transportation. Our room was very clean. Good value for money.

Very nice stylish rooms.
Hotel in general was very family friendly.

title: RockyPop Marseille Hôtel
description:
Located in Marseille, a 5-minute walk from Castellane Metro Station, RockyPop Marseille Hôtel provides accommodations with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel features family rooms.

Each room has a safety deposit box, while selected rooms are equipped with a balcony. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

RockyPop Marseille Hôtel offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

You can play table tennis at the accommodation.

Popular points of interest near RockyPop Marseille Hôtel include Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station, Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Center and Orange Velodrome Stadium. Marseille Provence Airport is 15 miles away.

top_reviews.review: Very nice hotel. Clean and modern. Breakfast was surprisingly good and varied.

Absolutely loved our stay at this hotel. The rooftop is great, the decor is trendy, the food at the restaurant is *very good* and reasonably priced.  Nice vibe and good music.  Hotel is very conveniently located near a key metro stop from which it is easy to quickly reach all sites reachable on metro.  Neighborhood is peaceful and safe. This is a new hotel that has very recently opened and it is great.

Cute hotel in a quiet, residential part of town.  Easily accessible through public transport.  Easily-available filtered water on the lobby, which you can bring up on glass bottles. Helpful bar staff that is happy to prepare drinks even if they are not on the menu. Decent working area in the room and the best internet access I got during the trip. The hotel heating was off when I visited and room could feel chilly.

the decoration of the hotel was superb.  Terrace and rooftop was nice. Games and bar downstairs had a really good vibe with DJ.  There is a karaoke room we did not use. The location is a residencial area.  Nothing much to do around and far away from downtown or beach by walking.  You must use metro or prepare to walk alot.
Love the quirkiness and decor. My adult son and I enjoyed playing table tennis and video games. Crash Bandicoot took me back to his childhood. Great fun. Loved it.
Super funky hotel. There are video games, table football and pingpong in the lobby. The bar is good too with music on the weekends. Really enjoyed my stay.

Good price, great staff, comfortable room and additional amenities that make the difference. Would highly recommend Honestly, not one bad thing I could say. The staff have been excellent, they made us feel very welcome and safe.

RockyPop was a unique and playful hotel that felt like being a big kid most of the time. From the rubix cube tissue boxes to the flamingo wallpaper in the bathroom, it was a visual feast!

The parking being under the hotel was convenient and reasonably priced and the staff were very friendly and helpful. Nice comfortable bed and good amenities in the rooms like a hairdryer. The teas could have done with being topped up between days and the restaurant was so-so.

The design of the hotel is super cute. The staff were very nice. 
The room we got had a big terrace. 
The breakfast is varied and delicious. 
The rooftop is stylish. 
This hotel is worth the visit.
The place is newly renovated and has a very fun and nostalgic feel. One elevator was out of service, but other than this the property proved everything we needed.

title: Hôtel Ligo by HappyCulture
description:
Attractively set in Marseille, Hôtel Ligo by HappyCulture has a buffet breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 4-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The hotel has family rooms.

Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bath, the rooms at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms contain a terrace. All guest rooms will provide guests with a closet and an electric tea pot.

Speaking English and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock.

Popular points of interest near Hôtel Ligo by HappyCulture include Vieux Port Metro Station, Joliette Metro Station and Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Center. Marseille Provence Airport is 13 miles from the property.

top_reviews.review: The Hotel was modern decorated, clean and comfortable. The staff was friendly and very helpful. They provided recommendations to explore the city, help in saving our luggage and take the time to make us feel good. The breakfast was good, but they can improve in order to provide more options. For example: variety of cheeses, variety of hams, etc. The breakfast variety was simple.

The hotel is close to the city centre, short walking distance to the main city attractions, train station and tram line. Good spacious room. The staff is super friendly. Breakfast is great too, good variety. We stayed in the room on the 5th floor, the weekend was windy, so it was pretty cold there because of the vents on the windows. It seems they were taped before, but the tape broke. I asked the staff to tape it again. Maybe they can fix the issue in the future permanently. Also the ceiling in the bathroom was a bit moldy.

Very nice property. Rooms were clean and mattress was comfortable. Breakfast is absolutely wonderful with so many choices!  Location is perfect for walking to see a lot of architectural buildings and churches.  Restaurants everywhere, again only minutes away.  Would definitely stay here again. Nothing
Absolute great location great staff, Hotel is brand new.
we loved our stay there. the location was great...room was spacious. bed/bedding was comfy. nice tub. great staff. highly recommend!

Excellent customer service with ALL staff. Both at the front desk & in the dining room. Overall exceptional! 
Thank you for making our stay in Marseille the very best. No need to change anything.
The location was perfect for our travel schedule. The rooms were spacious and modern. The staff was helpful and professional. No closets to hang clothing.
The hotel is situated near the old Port, making it easy to access the touristic areas. The room was as shown in the pictures, clean and well maintained. The staff was friendly and helpful.
Great location, clean and sufficient room. Simple - not the 4 stars advertised but just fine. Air con not great - so had a hot night. Overall, good value for the money. a bit hot

The location was quiet but walking distance to a bus station and the pier and La Panier neighborhood. Staff were super polite and helpful. Sabrina was really friendly and welcomed us warmly upon arrival, and she was eager to help us with anything. The breakfast was very good. The size of the rooms was pretty good, and it was very clean. I recommend this hotel to everyone The window shade was a little hard to open and close but nothing major.

title: Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Prado Périer
description:
Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Prado Périer is located in a residential district, 2461 feet from the Palais des Congrès and 0.6 mi from the Velodrome Stadium. This aparthotel offers an indoor swimming pool. Perier Metro Station is just 492 feet away and WiFi access is free.

A fully-equipped kitchen equipped with hotplates is a standard facility in the accommodations at Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Prado Périer. All studios and apartments have an LCD TV and some have a separate bedroom.

A buffet breakfast of French viennoiseries is served every morning in Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Prado Périer 's breakfast room. Children from 4 to 11 years old can enjoy it at a reduced rate. There are drinks and snacks vending machines in the 24-hour reception, which also has luggage storage.

The property can be accessed from the A50, a 5-minute drive away. Guests can enjoy the beach 2.5 mi away. Marseille Old Port is 1.9 mi away and Parc Chanot is an 8-minute walk from this residence. Public parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

availability.bed_configuration: Bedroom 1: 1 full bed Living room: 1 sofa bed

top_reviews.review: The staff were really helpful, the room was clean and tidy, the facilities (air conditioning and pool) were great!
Very clean, nice staff, several bus stops and underground lines in very short walking distance. good working A/C. the rooms were quiet. very well located, nice area.

Everything was comfortable but tiny.

Good breakfast A little too small
 No amenities.

the location was good, near the metro station to get into the main places in Marseille
the room was cleaan and with everyhting we were needing the pool was small but no problem we enjoyed marseille beaches

It is a very convenient aparthotel that is easy to reach, just 2 minutes away from the metro.
I find it to be a good value for money. It was clean, the staff were nice and helpful and they could speak English! The room is very convenient and well equipped. We especially appreciated the kitchen to make our own breakfast and the bathtub. The hotel has a small but nice and clean swimming pool which is accessible from 10 to 21.
Overall, it was a very pleasant experience, nothing super fancy, but all that you need for a few days, clean and well maintained, which is not a default in hotels, sadly.

One suggestion for improvement to make it even better: provide your guests with a welcoming couple of tea bags, a couple of capsules of coffee, and some shugar/salt/pepper. These things are not sold in small packs, so you need to buy way more than you need, which is not handy. Also, it would just be a very nice thing to get when you arrive late like I did. Minor things. I was not able to start the air conditioner to warm up the room, the mattresses were sliding apart and introducing a sizable gap between them (but that could be due to one of the sleepers being very animated in the sleep 😄), I was missing a cutting board in the kitchen.
Everything ok. Small, but well organised studio. Everything you need is available for free at reception, from a toaster to a yoga mat. Close to the metro station and 10 minutes walk from Velodrome.

Spacious, great location, close to train station, nicely decorated.  We had an issue with lockers (we didn’t receive the code) but we were assisted with sorting it out which was great. There are only two lockers so ensure you book.

The Aparthotel is located just some minutes from the nearest metro station. The room is well-equipped,the kitchen accessories are useful. Not sure how it works at the hotel but cleaning would be needed more frequently in the room.
It was close to a city centre. When we run out of toilet paper, they gave it to us and there was also free drinking water at the reception The hotel was a little old and the bathtub wasn’t stable
Great little apartment with fantastic amenities and cooking facilities in the room. Very comfortable and the staff were very friendly and welcoming. Would definitely recommend!

property_information: The Adagio access Marseille Prado Périer aparthotel offers accommodation in the heart of Marseilles. It benefits from a prime location on the edge of the city centre, a 12-minute walk from the Palais des Congrès and less than 20-minute walk from the Stade Vélodrome. Our 103 apartments are fully furnished and equipped and guests benefit from access to  a private car park. Guests can enjoy  our air pool from 10 a.m to 9 p.m. Combining the flexibility of an apartment with the services of a hotel, Adagio aparthotels are the best solution for medium and long stays, offering the utmost comfort and value for money to business travelers, vacationers and those who like to be both.

title: B&B HOTEL Marseille Parc Chanot
description:
The B&B Hotel Marseille Parc Chanot is located in Marseille. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. Each room is equipped with air conditioning and satellite TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower. Ironing facilities are also provided.

At the B&B Hotel Marseille Parc Chanot, you will find a 24-hour front desk and a terrace. You can purchase drinks from the vending machine.

Access to our hotel is via 7 Boulevard Latil, 13008 Marseille.

Access at the Total Station level is closed due to construction. The entrance to the parking lot is narrow with a height limit of 6.2 ft.

The hotel is 1312 feet from the Rond point du Prado, 0.6 mi from the Vélodrome stadium, and 0.9 mi from Castellane. Marseille Provence Airport is 17 mi away.

top_reviews.review: The location is perfect, not far from everything, restaurant, metro and bus stop nearby within few minutes walk. Pardo Beach is closed to the hotel. Staffs are helpful. Location is safe and calm during the night. The bathroom is quite small and the shower is not so comfortable due to the water leak and flood on the floor. You have to ask for a hairdryer.
The staff are nice and service mind especially the guy that we met on the check in time. The security is good using digital number to access. It quite difficult to open the big luggage in the room.
The hotel is in a good location, 6mins to bustops.The rooms were clean and staff were helpful too No lotion provided

This hotel did what it said on the tin. It was good value and the staff were very helpful. I found the bed super-comfortable.
It was perfectly located for the Orange Vélodrome, and it had parking! There was nothing I didn't like.
I did not expect frills!

Tout ! L’accueil était parfait, la réceptionniste très compréhensive et toujours prête à aider. La chambre était de bonne taille, propre, avec une douche suffisamment grande et impeccable. L’emplacement est pratique, proche d’une ligne de métro et avec un arrêt de bus juste à côté. Le petit-déjeuner était également très bien, exactement ce que j’attends d’un hôtel de ce genre. J’ai beaucoup apprécié de pouvoir profiter du séjour tranquillement. Rien à signaler, tout était très bien.
Localisation calme et très bien placée. Prix très raisonnable. Chambre exiguë où on ne peut pas poser sa valise ouverte. Rideau de douche trempant dans la douche.

La réceptionniste de nuit était une pépite. Pour une nuit, c'était juste suffisant pour se reposer et surtout à proximité du métro 2, ce qui m’a permis de prendre mon train à 6h00 du matin pour Paris.
Le personnel était très professionnel et très soucieux du confort ! L’hôtel commence un peu à vieillir mais rien d’alarmant
L'accueil de Kuider a L'accueil au top et très reactif

Chambre spacieuse et propre 
Nous étions pas loin du vélodrome ça c etais top 
Le petit déjeuner est copieux 
Le personnel est très sympa

title: Les Bords De Mer
description:
Located in Marseille, 1312 feet from Palais du Pharo, Les Bords De Mer has a number of amenities including   a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. The property is close to several noted attractions, around 2953 feet from Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilizations and around a 17-minute walk from Noter-Dame de la Garde Basilica.

The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with a shower. Most rooms have a balcony and sea view. At Les Bords De Mer every room comes with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.

Continental and buffet breakfast options are available daily at the accommodations.

At Les Bords De Mer guests are welcome to take advantage of an indoor swimming pool.

The 24-hour front desk can offer helpful tips for getting around the area.

Saint-Ferreol Street is 1.2 mi from the hotel. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 12 mi from Les Bords De Mer.

top_reviews.review: My favorite hotel in Marseille. Every year it’s a tradition in our family to stay there. The rooms are super light, clean, many pretty details. Wonderful view and very friendly staff. Suzanne Kaufmann cosmetics makes it feel like home. I love everything about this place, one of a kind🥰 Nothing

Great location right next to plage des Catalans and the CNM (with daily passes). Small boutique feel, with curated experience. The restaurant, sunset bar and spa are all excellent. Team was extremely welcoming and helpful. NA

Les Bords de Mer was a veritable breath of fresh  air in the not-so-clean city of Marseille. The hotel is refined, extremely clean, and comfortable. The staff are really nice. You can't beat the lovely view of the Mediterranean! No parking. The closest parking is one where the vehicles are frequently broken into.
The property faces the sea and is in a great part of town.

Th view was amazing as wll as the food
Great staff
The room was beautiful. Staff were courteous and always helpful. Good regardless of the meal was delicious. Nothing.
My forever favourite hotel, I will always come back when in Marseille!
Already my 5th? Stay at this amazing spot directly at the Mediterranean. Great location, spectacular views, cosy and tasteful rooms, great breakfast. Always come back to my favourite hotel!

V good breakfast.  Location amazing sea view. Locality itself not that picturesque otherwise - but great to be in the heart of the city in the midst of the hustle and bustle of the locals about their normal day to day lives.

Amazing location, beautiful rooms, and super attentive staff at the front desk. The service at breakfast was definitely not great. Food was never replenished, or simply took forever to get replenished - there was shortage of everything from bowls to fruit to water. It felt chaotic and understaffed, which is a shame because technically it could have been great if the actual food was available. I would also suggest to make breakfast longer, until 10:30 at least.

title: ADIRA Résid'Marseille Vieux-port 2 étoiles
description:
ADIRA Résid'Marseille Vieux-port 2 étoiles is a recently renovated apartment in the center of Marseille, 1.2 miles from Plage des Catalans and a 4-minute walk from Vieux Port Metro Station. With free Wifi, this 2-star apartment offers an elevator and full-day security. The property is close to popular attractions like Joliette Metro Station, Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations, and Notre Dame de la Garde Basilica.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and a shower. A microwave, a fridge, and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

There is an on-site coffee shop.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Castellane Metro Station, Saint-Ferreol Street, and Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. Marseille Provence Airport is 14 miles from the property.

top_reviews.review: Great Apartment, clean modern and safe. Good location near the shops near the old port.

Lots of positives. Clear instructions on how to get into the apartment and access the keys. Lockbox was convenient. Central location was perfect for everything we wanted to do, without being too busy or noisy at night, and the apartment was well-situated for connections to public transport, including local transport and the St Charles train station. It was spacious, clean and modern, and had all the items we needed, including kitchen equipment basics and some coffee pods. As the apartment was on the top floor, there wasn't any noise from above, and I didn't hear any other guests. Shower had good water pressure and plenty of hot water. Air conditioning worked well and was appreciated! We hadn't realised that the two bedrooms weren't fully separate. One is in a sunken area, down a few steps from the living room, and the other is on a mezzanine, with a partial glass wall on one side, and a curtain on that wall. As it was just two of us, we could work around it and it didn't cause too much of a problem. A curtain for the downstairs bedroom might provide a bit more privacy and make it slightly less likely that the first person awake wakes up the others. I would still stay here again with a friend - the location, in particular, is excellent.
The location is excellent because is very near by the viuex port, it's comfortable overall and the attention of the staff was the best It needs bathroom supplies, such as hand soap  and conditioner

Adira Résid’Marseille looked exactly as pictured in the photos! It was directly across from a market and a short walk to Old Port! An excellent location! It was very quaint, stylish, and homey. The linens on a couple of beds had small stains.

We loved how close this place was to the port and nearby attractions. Walking distance to most places. Very centrally located and a quick walk to the train station. The bed needed to be unfolded and took up a big portion of the room. It was very comfortable however.

The location was perfect. We could get around so easily.
The beds were really comfortable. there was a bit of noise at night from other apartments.

Perfect location 
Perfect for family
We had a problem with the payment of the deposit but they were really professional and they found a solution wright away
Room was confortable and very well equipped 
Room offer everything thing you need
I will definitely come back again

Comfort, cleanliness, well decorated, with a very useful elevator (not easy to find in the buildings around) and perfectly located near everything around Vieux Port. Missing ventilation. A small window can be created to open up (vertically) in one of the big window panels.
Laundry detergents could be provided.... We had to buy everything for a one-off use along with soap.
Very good location, close to everything in Marseille! I would come here again!

Great location, very comfortable, clean, everything you needed was at hand There was a bad smell on the ground floor entrance but the weather was very hot when we were there. The smell disappeared as you went up the stairs to the 2nd floor apt

title: Résidence Kley Marseille République
description:
Résidence Kley Marseille République in Marseille offers accommodations with free Wifi, a 10-minute walk from Vieux Port Metro Station, 600 yards from Joliette Metro Station, and a 9-minute walk from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Center. The property is around 1.5 miles from Castellane Metro Station, 1.9 miles from Palais du Pharo, and 1.9 miles from Notre Dame de la Garde Basilica. The property is 1.6 miles from Plage des Catalans and within 0.7 miles of the city center.

The condo hotel is composed of 1 separate bedroom, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a fridge, and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are offered in the condo hotel. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the condo hotel include Saint-Ferreol Street, Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations, and Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. Marseille Provence Airport is 13 miles from the property.

top_reviews.review: Small apartment with all the necessary amenities. Very clean, freshly renovated bathroom. Great location, secure entrance. For this price, highly recommended. The mattress is too hard and the pillow is too thin.
Perfect location, the staff was helpful, room with an ensuite bathroom wasvery clean. We appreciated being able to cook and dry our laundry.
Clean, basic things, free coffee, place to cook if want, value for money Bit tricky maybe to find the entrance, if not coming during check in times,

Calm location, though there are many students. Good kitchen. Bed was fine. There was new frontdoor, so you could not enter without a key. It was not clear how or where to enter when I wanted to check in. There was no sign, no doorbell, no instructions, no nameplate, nothing. Telephone call was not answered. I had to ask people who live in the same building. They opened the frontdoor for me. No sign inside where to go. So these people said how to go. Very friendly reception, so I got the key and explanation.
Endroit parfait pour visiter le panier,, le vieux port, se rendre à la gare, au pied du tram et la gentillesse  de la jeune équipe en place y compris le gardien des lieux. Rien à signaler
La ubicación fue excelente, a 10 minutos andando por la calle principal de lo que es el puerto. Todo limpio y organizado.

title: Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Prado Périer
description:
Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Prado Périer is located in a residential district, 2461 feet from the Palais des Congrès and 0.6 mi from the Velodrome Stadium. This aparthotel offers an indoor swimming pool. Perier Metro Station is just 492 feet away and WiFi access is free.

A fully-equipped kitchen equipped with hotplates is a standard facility in the accommodations at Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Prado Périer. All studios and apartments have an LCD TV and some have a separate bedroom.

A buffet breakfast of French viennoiseries is served every morning in Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Prado Périer 's breakfast room. Children from 4 to 11 years old can enjoy it at a reduced rate. There are drinks and snacks vending machines in the 24-hour reception, which also has luggage storage.

The property can be accessed from the A50, a 5-minute drive away. Guests can enjoy the beach 2.5 mi away. Marseille Old Port is 1.9 mi away and Parc Chanot is an 8-minute walk from this residence. Public parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

top_reviews.review: The staff were really helpful, the room was clean and tidy, the facilities (air conditioning and pool) were great!
Very clean, nice staff, several bus stops and underground lines in very short walking distance. good working A/C. the rooms were quiet. very well located, nice area.

Everything was comfortable but tiny.

Good breakfast A little too small
 No amenities.

the location was good, near the metro station to get into the main places in Marseille
the room was cleaan and with everyhting we were needing the pool was small but no problem we enjoyed marseille beaches

It is a very convenient aparthotel that is easy to reach, just 2 minutes away from the metro.
I find it to be a good value for money. It was clean, the staff were nice and helpful and they could speak English! The room is very convenient and well equipped. We especially appreciated the kitchen to make our own breakfast and the bathtub. The hotel has a small but nice and clean swimming pool which is accessible from 10 to 21.
Overall, it was a very pleasant experience, nothing super fancy, but all that you need for a few days, clean and well maintained, which is not a default in hotels, sadly.

One suggestion for improvement to make it even better: provide your guests with a welcoming couple of tea bags, a couple of capsules of coffee, and some shugar/salt/pepper. These things are not sold in small packs, so you need to buy way more than you need, which is not handy. Also, it would just be a very nice thing to get when you arrive late like I did. Minor things. I was not able to start the air conditioner to warm up the room, the mattresses were sliding apart and introducing a sizable gap between them (but that could be due to one of the sleepers being very animated in the sleep 😄), I was missing a cutting board in the kitchen.
Everything ok. Small, but well organised studio. Everything you need is available for free at reception, from a toaster to a yoga mat. Close to the metro station and 10 minutes walk from Velodrome.

Spacious, great location, close to train station, nicely decorated.  We had an issue with lockers (we didn’t receive the code) but we were assisted with sorting it out which was great. There are only two lockers so ensure you book.

The Aparthotel is located just some minutes from the nearest metro station. The room is well-equipped,the kitchen accessories are useful. Not sure how it works at the hotel but cleaning would be needed more frequently in the room.
It was close to a city centre. When we run out of toilet paper, they gave it to us and there was also free drinking water at the reception The hotel was a little old and the bathtub wasn’t stable
Great little apartment with fantastic amenities and cooking facilities in the room. Very comfortable and the staff were very friendly and welcoming. Would definitely recommend!

property_information: The Adagio access Marseille Prado Périer aparthotel offers accommodation in the heart of Marseilles. It benefits from a prime location on the edge of the city centre, a 12-minute walk from the Palais des Congrès and less than 20-minute walk from the Stade Vélodrome. Our 103 apartments are fully furnished and equipped and guests benefit from access to  a private car park. Guests can enjoy  our air pool from 10 a.m to 9 p.m. Combining the flexibility of an apartment with the services of a hotel, Adagio aparthotels are the best solution for medium and long stays, offering the utmost comfort and value for money to business travelers, vacationers and those who like to be both.

title: Maison Galante au Vieux Port
description:
Maison Galante au Vieux Port features rooms with free Wifi in the center of Marseille. This recently renovated condo hotel is located a 17-minute walk from Plage des Catalans and 300 yards from Vieux Port Metro Station. Guests can access the condo hotel via private entrance.

The units at the condo hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box, and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower, slippers, and a hair dryer. A dishwasher, an oven, and microwave are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the condo hotel, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the condo hotel can enjoy fishing nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace.

Popular points of interest near Maison Galante au Vieux Port include Saint-Ferreol Street, Castellane Metro Station, and Joliette Metro Station. Marseille Provence Airport is 14 miles away.

top_reviews.review:
The apartment was equisite, from every component to every surface you touched. Comfortable, beautifully fitted out, and an abundance of space and luxury is the only way to describe this apartment. Then there is the location and the view from every window, which was just superb. The view over the harbour wasted hours of our time, but when out, there was water, boats, magnificient sights in every direction and multiple restaurants and bars just literally metres away from the front door.
This apartmemt would easily accomodate 3 couples, and is easily big enough that you would not feel in the least bit crowded. Love this place and it's location. A must do if you get the chance. Nothing.

The apartment is very nicely and modernly equipped. In an excellent location close to the bus station, metro and taxi. In the center of the old port. The hosts are friendly and quickly respond to questions. Every compliment and successful work in the future!

The new modern stylish apartment, large enough, with very good design, not noisy (even it has a crowded port location), has all facilities needed, very comfortable and clean. It is not cheap, but worth the money. Would definitely recommend. There was no iron and ironing board (the steam hand-generator was not enough). Last night was very cold, as the centralized VRV system suddenly started to freeze, and we were not able to do anything with that.
The location, comfort and design are just amazing. I would recommend with no doubt Could be a little bit noisy on the street side.

Emplacement, décoration, équipement 

Vue spectaculaire sur le vieux port.
مكان رائع جدا ونظيف فعلا مكان فخم للغايه كل شي علي مايرام لايوجد شي

Toll eingerichtet! Sehr sauber! Gute Lage. Fühlten uns sehr wohl hier. :) Nur Kleinigkeiten (kaum Haken um Handtücher aufzuhängen, kein Ersatz-WC-Papier, Lift funktionierte die ganze Woche nicht), aber sonst alles super!

Impression d’être dans un hôtel 5*.
Emplacement parfait sur le vieux port.
Déco intérieure au top. Il manque un mode d’emploi des équipements électroniques (on ne sait toujours pas à quoi sert le bouton avec une icône « ondes » sur les glaces). Fonctionnement des équipements la serrure un peu délicate la première fois.

L’emplacement

Facilité d’accès
Nous avons passées un excellent séjour dans cet appartement. Les prestations sont exceptionnelles, la décoration est magnifique et le logement était très propre. Nous avons tout adoré.

property_information:
Experience the Mediterranean art of living in our luxurious apartments on Marseille's iconic Vieux-Port.

Culture enthusiasts will relish the proximity to the Palais du Pharo and the Mucem, hosting year-round exhibitions. The internationally acclaimed Marseille Opera House is just a 4-minute stroll away. Step aboard the iconic Ferry Boat at the foot of the building to cross the port and discover the renowned Panier district, celebrated for its authentic charm and artisan boutiques. Don't miss the must-see Vieille Charité, a historical gem built in 1640.

For relaxation, the terraces of Place aux Huiles, a stone's throw from the property, offer the perfect setting for a festive and local ambiance. Embark on an adventure to explore the Calanques National Park or the surrounding islands, with boat rentals and shuttles conveniently available on the port.

Fashion lovers will be delighted by Rue Paradis, home to an array of luxury boutiques, perfect for an indulgent shopping experience. Maison Galante offers you large apartments in the heart of the Old Port, offering an unforgettable experience, combining ideal location, autonomy, comfort and refined style. 
Book now and immerse yourself in the unique atmosphere of the Phocaean city for a memorable vacation. Thanks to Hoptiguest, leave with peace of mind and benefit from exclusive hotel services with our concierge service, while being independent in your accommodation. Discover the Mediterranean art of living at the Old Port of Marseille. Take advantage of the proximity of the Palais du Pharo and the Mucem. For shopping, stroll through the luxury boutiques on Rue Paradis. Catalans beach is a 20-minute walk away for a swim in the sea, or rent a boat to explore the coves. Relax on the terraces of Place aux Huiles and take the ferry boat to the Panier district.

top_reviews.review:
Lots of space, perfect for our girls getaway. Bedrooms comfortable and rooms large. The host was very responsive and helpful.

Wonderful location in the city center, about 10-15 minutes walk from the main Harbour, shops and groceries right outside the door. It was under-equipped in the kitchen (eg. no cutting board, one dull knife, nothing more than a few plates and bowls really), but this did not sorely affect the stay.  It also appears to be an office that’s been converted to an apartment, which threw us off a bit 🤔
Very spacious. Huge tv. Wifi great. Very easy to get everywhere in town from the apartment. 2 full washrooms

We loved how spacious the unit was, how quiet the unit was despite the busy street, the kitchenette features, the huge screen for entertainment, the showers were hot and heavenly, and all the different sleeping options. The only cons were the laundry facilities were unavailable but I was grateful the host gave directions and a recommendation to a nearby laundry. There was a water machine there that didn’t dispense water. I would recommend hand soaps for all bathrooms. The pillows were small on some beds and linens were a little scratchy. Overall, I would stay here again for ease of use, amenities, and quietness.

Great place and very spacious!! The large screen was perfect for watching the Olympics and playing PS5 when we weren't exploring Marseille. It was a great experience and we'd definitely stay here again.

Location was central and very convenient. The flat was spotless and our host was friendly, helpful , communicative and reliable. And The TV screen for the rugby was absolutely awesome It needed a tea towel 😆

El apartamento es extraordinario. Su emplazamiento perfecto, las habitaciones amplias y bonitas, la pantalla de televisión impresionante. Todo han sido facilidades con el propietario que ha estado siempre pendiente de nuestras necesidades y ha solucionado cualquier duda rápidamente. La mejor experiencia hasta el momento con un apartamento turístico. Fantástico.
Quien pueda disfrutarlo será un afortunado. Todo me gustó

Tout le logement était top, canapé très confortable, lit super confort. 
Écran géant de très bonne qualité, avec très bon son.
L’appartement était très propre, bonne odeur.
Exactement identique au photos. 
Douche parfaite!
Tout était nickel , merci !
Je recommande en 100% , accessible à pieds, de bon restaurants autours.
Le confort d’un grand espace, d’une literie de qualité et tout le matériel mis à notre disposition il ne manque rien!

Propre
Spacieux 
Très bien situé 
Très bon accueil
L appartement est vraiment incroyable, c ´est immense et ultra confortable.

title: Liberté et élégance au coeur de Marseille
description:
Liberté et élégance au coeur de Marseille is located in Marseille, just a 14-minute walk from Vieux Port Metro Station and 1.5 miles from Castellane Metro Station. With garden views, this accommodation offers a terrace. Free Wifi is available throughout the property and Plage des Catalans is 1.8 miles away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bath and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, Joliette Metro Station, and Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Center. Marseille Provence Airport is 14 miles from the property.

availability.bed_configuration: Bedroom 1: 1 full bed Bedroom 2: 1 queen bed Living room: 1 sofa bed

top_reviews.review: The apartment is beautiful, spotless and perfect. It's very close to the station and we loved it all. Nothing
Beautiful apartment to stay in would recommend. Has two bathrooms and large kitchen. Close to the station. Owners are lovely very friendly and super helpful

The apartment was excellent, beautifully furnished and equipped, with a generous terrace, two bedrooms and two bathrooms, a living room with a sofa bed, coffee on the house, located 5 minutes from the central station. Flavie is an excellent host, very nice, keeps everything very clean and let us bring our luggage earlier than check in hour.

Ubytovanie bolo fantastické. Apartmán bol priestranny, pohodlný, s kompletným vybavením kuchyne. Boli sme 5 dospeli. Kúpeľne bolo postačujúce, jedna veľká s dvomi umyvadlami, vaňou/sprchovým kútom a toaletou. Druhá bola menšia, ale úplne vyhovovala (1 umývadlo, sprchový kút, toaleta). 
V skriniach boli deky, vankúše navyse, co ocenili ti, ktorí potrebujú viac vankúšov.
Ako bonus, priestor navyse - terasa, kde sa sme si prijemne podvečer posedili.
Lokalita super, blízko hlavná stanica, stanica metra alebo na pešo, v kľude 15 minút do prístavu. Pekárne, obchody s potravinami oproti apartmánu alebo na ulici. V mensej kupelni bol problém so zámkom na dverách - nedali sa zvnutra otvorit dvere. Vhodné opraviť, ale to je drobnosť.
Belle décoration, l’équipement de la cuisine est appréciable, chambres spacieuses et confortables, la terrasse est très agréable
Logement accueillant, spacieux et très bien équipé (machine à café en grains, extracteur de jus, tout le nécessaire pour cuisiner), 2 salles de bain, lits confortables et très belle déco.

Eenvoudige check-in, gezellig ingericht en erg netjes, alle basisproducten aanwezig (zeep, afwasproducten, olie, koffie…), dat maakt het erg comfortabel. De beamer was een leuk extraatje om ‘s avonds een film te projecten voor de kinderen. 
Bedankt voor het leuke verblijf en het lieve welkomstgeschenkje op de tafel. :)

Bel emplacement, 5 minutes de la gare et du métro, 15 minutes à pied du vieux port.
Bel aménagement intérieur, une grande pièce à vivre avec une grande terrasse. La cage d'escalier fait un peu peur.et quelques petites remise a niveau a faire. Mais rien de vraiment gênant.

Appartamento meraviglioso, arredato con gusto, pulitissimo e dotato di tutti i confort. La cucina è molto attrezzata, i letti sono comodi e le stanze ampie e luminose. Flavie ci ha accolto al nostro arrivo ed è stata attenta e disponibile durante tutto il soggiorno.

La casa és espectacular: nueva (reformada), afable, bonita, con todo tipo de detalles, utensilios y comodidades. Una pena no poder haber utilizado la terrazita particular  disponible por mal tiempo. Pero una gozada llegar después de todo el día fuera pateando. Te dan ganas de quedarte en la casa un buen rato, 😅. 
La ubicación, inmejorable: a 8 minutos de la estación principal de trenes y autobuses de Marsella, con metro a 5 minutos, y a 15 minutos del Puerto Viejo.
Los anfitriones: muy amables en todo momento, facilitándonos poder dejar las maletas antes de la hora del checking e infirmándonos de una empresa de guardaequipaje en la propia estación de trenes y autobuses (desde donde sale el bus al aeropuerto) para el checkout. Por poner algún pero:
- La cama de la primera habitación, hacia mucho ruido con cada movimiento.
- La posibilidad de dejar más papel higiénico para estancias largas.
- El edificio es bastante antiguo (como todo el centro de Marsella), y las escaleras son bastante viejas (es un primero). Actualmente en reparación.

title: NH Collection Marseille
description:
Featuring a cocktail bar, garden and a fitness center on the 6th floor, NH Collection Marseille is located in the new business and leisure district of Marseille, La Joliette. Located between the port and the city center, the building was inaugurated by Napoleon III in 1864 and preserves its original style.

Rooms at NH Collection Marseille feature elegant décor and offer an electric kettle, coffee machine and private bathroom.

Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant, which serves local and international dishes with a variety of local cheeses and wines.Guests can also find a cocktail bar located close to the hotel reception, as well as a garden in the center of the hotel.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property as well as 4 meeting rooms.

Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilizations is 2953 feet from NH Collection Marseille, while Palais du Pharo is 0.9 mi away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 12 mi from NH Collection Marseille.

title: Résidence Meublée Services
description:
Résidence Meublée Services is located in the center of Marseille, just a 15-minute walk from the Old Port. Guests can visit the Noter Dame de la Garde Basilica 0.9 mi away.

The self-catering accommodations at Résidence Meublée Services are simply decorated with linoleum floors. The accommodations offer a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

Guests can prepare homemade meals in the fully equipped kitchen and a supermarket is just 66 feet away. Bars and restaurants can also be found 66 feet away.

The Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is 1.2 mi away and the Marseille-Marignane Airport is a 30-minute drive away. Guests can hike in the Calanques just 6.2 mi away or take the ferry to Frioul Island from the Old Port.

availability.bed_configuration: Bedroom 1: 1 full bed Living room: 1 sofa bed

top_reviews.review: The owner is super responsive and friendly. The price is super value given the apartment comfort and the location. Appartement is clean overall. Perfect for a business trip.

Appartment was simple, but well organized and very clean. Street a little bit abandoned at night, but great budget friendly restaurants. Nearby busses, metro, and a short10 min walk to the harbour. Shower a little small for larger people. Great value for money! Street a little empty at night.  Shower a little small for larger people.

The room was clean and it came with a kitchen and a private bathroom. The hotel is close to the Old Port and many other interesting sites. The internet and all other elements in the room were good. The staff is a bit hard to get a hold of and they don't speak English, but we managed. On booking it states the room comes with an AC, but it was just a fan.

location. and the aposrtnent is very worthy in terms of price-quality 
furnished kitchen and all necessary items not staff in the reception. I paid for a Laundry and dryer but it was broken because it didn’t work

Very spacious apartment with adequate hob and spacious fridge. 
A good sized living room area (with table) where you could have your own meals. 
There was a shared washing machine near reception which is ideal for travelers like us that are interrailing around Europe. The apartment is designed for extra people to stay on a sofa bed (in the living room area); however there isn't a separate ac unit to cover this room - the only ac unit is in the bedroom.
This property was clean, comfortable and had all the facilities we needed. The location was excellent, being 2min from the Rome Dragon tram stop, that was very good for getting into Vieux Port

Very convenient location, just a nice walk to the Port and City Center, in a quiet neighborhood.
The lady who was in charge of housekeeping was very cooperative and very kind, despite the language barrier.
Apartment slightly “spartan” but clean and equipped.
Washer and dryer (for a fee) also available, and parking (also for a fee) in a very convenient underground parking garage close to the apartment. The only, very slight flaw: the coffee maker present in the kitchen was not working.

Very cleaned room and so comfortable.
It’s really easy to go anywhere that sightseeing,
Adding, the host was so kind for us.
I recommend all of persons who visit marseille.

Good location, close to many tourists spots like the Old Port, cathedral or basilica. Also not so far from the railway station (about 20 minutes on foot). Small but useful kitchen with toaster, fridge and microwave. Air conditioning. Two beds actually, with one fold out sofa and one double bed. Elevator in the building.

Staff were lovely and informative. Location not on an incline! Lovely to have an apartment Prices inflated due to the 

olympics but to be expected

title: Montempô Marseille Centre Dôme
description:
Montempô Marseille Centre Dôme offers accommodations in Marseille, 1.8 miles from La Timone Metro Station and 2.6 miles from Vieux Port Metro Station. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and an elevator, along with free Wifi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

At the condo hotel, the units include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, and towels. There's also a fully equipped kitchen with kitchenware. At the condo hotel, all units are soundproof.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries, juice, and cheese are available.

Castellane Metro Station is 2.7 miles from the condo hotel, while Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is 2.7 miles from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 15 miles away.

top_reviews.review: I love this location (near metro station) and the kitchen in rooms.
The staff were very accommodating and we had an awesome view from the 10th floor of the city and mountains.
Basic but surprisingly comfortable room. We enjoyed our stay.

Very helpful staff. Laundry option in the building. Comfy beds and a fridge in the room. We had a room facing the LeDome, but I would have preferred a room overlooking the yard and without the highway noises.

The location, extremely close to the Dome, ideal if going to a concert there. 
Shops nearby. Friendly staff!

The location was good 
The room was comfy and clean 
There was an iron available for the guests
The staff was very nice and helpful
We could leave our luggage the next day No AC, just a fan but it was okay for us

My husband and I felt very comfortable staying in Montempo. The subway was near, and the bakery nearby Montreux was yummy. The surroundings did not please us at all. The neighborhood seemed dangerous for arriving at night. Nothing happened to us at least :)
Great location, in the heart of Marseille. Excellent coffee machine and courtyard for the morning croissants. No balconies

Nice room, with fridge and kitchenette. Close to supermarkets, and metro station. The room is clean, dishes were clean as previous guests left them. There was a fan in the room. Staff were always very kind and helpful. Have to go around a building to reach metro on its other side. Would be nice to have a short way. Supermarkets start at 8:30 or 8 (SPAR), but the accommodation cannot change this.
Lovely staff, they were nice and helpful. Location is good and the room was spacious and well equipped. No air conditioning.
